As an AI language model, I do not have access to the future, but I can tell you that the entertainment industry is always on the lookout for the latest technologies that can enhance the audience experience to keep up with the changing market trends.

Some of the already emerging technologies that the entertainment industry is exploring include:

1. Virtual and augmented reality
2. Artificial intelligence
3. 5G connectivity and edge computing
4. Blockchain technology
5. Motion capture and facial recognition technology
6. Cloud-based rendering and post-production
7. Projectors with 4K technology and higher resolution
8. Interactive storytelling tools

These technologies have significant potential to impact the entertainment industry positively. They can enhance audience engagement, provide new experiences, and enable content creators to tell their stories in new ways. 

As technology continues to advance, new opportunities and challenges will arise, shaping the future of the entertainment industry.
